articles.description: The state says a "significant portion" of coronavirus vaccines are sitting on shelves untouched. But on the ground, members of the public are having troubles finding appointments, and providers say they’re all booked up.
articles.content:
AUSTIN — State Rep. Michelle Beckley, D-Carrollton, doesn’t get any special access to the coronavirus vaccine just because she’s an elected official.

articles.title: U.S. COVID-19 cases surpass 20 million as deaths mount - Reuters
articles.description: U.S. coronavirus cases crossed the 20 million mark on Friday as officials seek to speed up vaccinations and a more infectious variant surfaces in Colorado, California and Florida.
articles.content:
(Reuters) - U.S. coronavirus cases crossed the 20 million mark on Friday as officials seek to speed up vaccinations and a more infectious variant surfaces in Colorado, California and Florida.
